name: Squats
details: Squats are a very productive strength-training exercise that targets several muscle groups at once, including hamstrings, quadriceps and glute muscles.

name: Planks
details: Squats are a very productive strength-training exercise that targets several muscle groups at once, including hamstrings, quadriceps and glute muscles.

name: Lunges
details: Lunges are a functional exercise that challenges your balance while also enhancing the strength of your glutes and leg muscles.

name: Push-ups
details: Push-ups are a very basic yet result-worthy exercise that involves several muscles while performing.Start with 3 sets of 10 reps.

name: Burpees
details: Burpees are a super-effective, full-body exercise that offers great results for your cardiovascular strength.Stand upright with your feet.

name: Glute bridge
details: It is one of the best exercises for your entire posterior chain that helps keep your buttocks strengthened and in shape.Lie on the floor on your back
